short_summary: Robotic Process Automation Solution for SSC’s Chief Information Office - Center of Expertise
description: Robotic Process Automation Solution for SSC’s Chief Information Office - Center of ExpertiseThis solicitation is open only to SSC Robotic Process Software (RPA) Solution Standing Offer (SO) Holders. The solicitation is issued within the RPA Solution Standing Offer number 2BS-1-91027.  All terms and conditions of the SO apply and are incorporated into any resulting contract.SSC intends to award one (1) Call-up for a period of 1 year and 4 optional years for a total of 5 years.The solution bid by the winner of this solicitation will become the incumbent solution. Under the Scaling Mechanism of the Standing Offer, competition for follow-on requirements may be limited Standing Offer Holders who have qualified to sell the incumbent solution up to the cumulative limits of 25 years duration or $70M in value.Security Level: There are Security Requirements Associated with this requirement.The following Standing Offer Holders will be invited to submit a proposal:Automation AnywhereBits in GlassBurnie GroupComputacenter TerramachIPSSKPMGFile Number: R129508Contracting Authority: Keven HarveyEmail: coeaip-ceaan@ssc-spc.gc.caPosting Period: As Per Canada Buys postingThe Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.(Note: only relevant information from tender description in English)
full_summary:
**Title (English and French)**

* **Title (English)**: SSC's Chief Information Office - Center of Expertise Robotic Process Automation Solicitation
* **Title (French)**: Automatisation des processus robotiques pour le Bureau principal de l'information de SPC - Centre d'expertise

**Reference and Solicitation Information**

* **Reference Number**: SSC-23-00022890:T
* **Solicitation Number**: BPM018935/22890
* **Publication Date**: 2023-06-22
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-07-07T14:00:00 (expired)

**Contracting Authority Information**

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Shared Services Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada

**procurement Information**

* **procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **procurement Source**: Canada
* **trade Agreements**: AED Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), AED Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, AED General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade (GATT), AED of Atlantic Procurement Agreement, and AED of Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement are authorized.

**Requirement Description**

This solicitation is open only to SSC's Robotic Process Automation (RPA) Solution Standing Offer (SO) Holders for a Robotic Process Automation solution for SCC’s Chief Information Office – Center of Expertise.

Required solution: 

* Automation solution and process evaluation.
* Leadership of the solution implementation.
* Instruction on the training of the officer to operate the solution.
* Handling and custody of the robotic equipment together with the operator.
* Availability of support.

contract term: 

* 5 contract years with ONE mandatory order of 12 months and FOUR Optional of the half year for the total of 5 native year.
* Maximum cost: $7,500,000.
